generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: JigsawStructure World
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: A Jigsaw Structure is a group of Structure Templates that make up a larger structure.Jigsaw Structures are placed during world generation.

fields.title: biome_filters
fields.description: Biomes in which the Jigsaw Structure can generate.

fields.title: test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

fields.title: GenerationStep
fields.description: Species the world generation phase in which the structure is generated.

fields.title: enum SharedTypes_v1_21_20_JigsawStructureDefinition_TerrainAdaptation
fields.description: How the terrain should adapt relative to the generated Jigsaw Structure.

fields.title: start_pool
fields.description: The first Template Pool to use when generating the Jigsaw Structure.

fields.title: max_distance_from_center
fields.description: This is the max distance from the jigsaw pieces to the structure start: [1-128]

fields.title: start_height
fields.description: Height at which the Jigsaw Structure's start pool should begin.

fields.title: start_jigsaw_name
fields.description: The start jigsaw name is the name of the jigsaw block from the start pool to be placed first.

fields.title: max_depth
fields.description: The maximum recursion depth for Jigsaw Structure Generation. For example, a Jigsaw Structure that builds a road with a max_depth of 5 will only have paths that are a maximum of 5 structures templates in length in any given direction from the origin.

fields.title: enum SharedTypes_v1_21_20_JigsawStructureDefinition_HeightmapProjection
fields.description: Heightmap used to calculate the relative start height. For example, a heightmap_projection of ocean_floor and a start_height of 10 means the Jigsaw Structure will begin generating 10 blocks above the ocean floor.

fields.title: dimension_padding
fields.description: Dimension padding prevents the structure from getting cut off at the top or bottom of the world.

fields.title: pool_aliases
fields.description: Pool Aliases are used to determine which template pool can be a substitute.
